properties.name: value
properties.docstring: A unique identifier for the item.

properties.name: disabled
properties.docstring: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

properties.name: header
properties.docstring: The header of the accordion item.

properties.name: content
properties.docstring: The content of the accordion item.

properties.name: type
properties.docstring: The type of accordion (single or multiple).

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The value of the item to expand.

properties.name: default_value
properties.docstring: The default value of the item to expand.

properties.name: collapsible
properties.docstring: Whether or not the accordion is collapsible.

properties.name: disabled
properties.docstring: Whether or not the accordion is disabled.

properties.name: dir
properties.docstring: The reading direction of the accordion when applicable.

properties.name: duration
properties.docstring: The time in milliseconds to animate open and close

properties.name: easing
properties.docstring: The easing function to use for the animation.

properties.name: show_dividers
properties.docstring: Whether to show divider lines between items.

events.name: on_value_change
events.docstring: Fired when the opened the accordions changes.

styling_props.name: radius
styling_props.docstring: The radius of the accordion corners.
